Question & Options:
Which of the following statements accurately describe the relationships among the characters in *Slumdog Millionaire*?
Options:
A. A) Rajendranath Zutshi's character collaborates with the police department.
B. B) Irrfan Khan's character is a police inspector.
C. C) Saurabh Shukla portrays a character who is part of the police department.
D. D) All of the above

Which statements accurately describe the relationships between the characters in *Slumdog Millionaire*?
Options:
A. A) Rajendranath Zutshi's character collaborates with the police.
B. B) Irrfan Khan's character is a police officer monitoring a crime boss.
C. C) Mahesh Manjrekar plays a crime boss that the police are watching.
D. D) Javed Khan is unrelated to the police department.
Correct Answer: A) Rajendranath Zutshi's character collaborates with the police., B) Irrfan Khan's character is a police officer monitoring a crime boss., C) Mahesh Manjrekar plays a crime boss that the police are watching.

Correct Answer: B) Irrfan Khan, C) Saurabh Shukla, D) Police Constable Srinivas
